about_the_game:
Becoming Ignis, entrusted with the restoration of Orbis, is not the end of your journey. Now, you can dive deeper into the world you've just conquered and see how and where everything started.

This Artbook is your unique behind-the-scenes look at the characters, setting, insights, and vast world of Flame Keeper. Explore the thought process of creating this unusual rogue's gallery of monsters in various biomes, and see how it developed from concept to the intriguing game you've just finished!
detailed_description:
Becoming Ignis, entrusted with the restoration of Orbis, is not the end of your journey. Now, you can dive deeper into the world you've just conquered and see how and where everything started.

This Artbook is your unique behind-the-scenes look at the characters, setting, insights, and vast world of Flame Keeper. Explore the thought process of creating this unusual rogue's gallery of monsters in various biomes, and see how it developed from concept to the intriguing game you've just finished!

name: Flame Keeper - Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Becoming Ignis and restoring Orbis is just the beginning. Dive deeper into the world of Flame Keeper with this Artbook, offering a unique behind-the-scenes look at the characters, settings, and creative process. Explore the evolution of the game’s monsters and biomes from concept to completion.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Polish, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian
